duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate in a team-based environment to ensure quality, safe, and efficient refilling, re-valving, requalifying, refurbishing, packaging, and storage of propane cylinders.
Perform washer functions, dispatch cylinders to different stations, complete paint line operations, and operate shot blast, tare weight entry station, capper, and stacker.
Manually check for leaks, weight problems, or sleeve malfunctions and perform cylinder refurb operations based on work station.
Stack finished products and check for quality assurance.
Work in an outdoor environment with varying temperature conditions and perform labor-intensive tasks requiring frequent lifting and stacking of 40lb cylinders.
